body:
Create Trigger $TABLOADI$_$TRIG_FUNC$ On $TABLOADI$
    For $TRIG_FUNC$
As
Set NoCount On
Begin 
    Begin Try
		
		Declare c$TABLOADI$ Cursor Local For
			Select	* 
			From	$TRIG_FUNC$ed i
		Open c$TABLOADI$
		Fetch Next From c Into @var
		While @@FETCH_STATUS = 0 Begin
					
		
			Fetch Next From c$TABLOADI$ Into @var
		End
		Close c$TABLOADI$
		Deallocate c$TABLOADI$

    End Try
    Begin Catch
        Declare @ITObjectName nVarchar(126);
        Set @ITObjectName = Object_Name(@@PROCID);
        Execute SP15_GenerateError @ITObjectName;
    End Catch
End
Go
